titles.title: O For A Thousand Tongues To Sing (Charles Wesley)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O for a thousand tongues to sing My great Redeemer’s praise, The glories of my God and King The triumphs of His Grace.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My gracious Master and my God, Assist me to proclaim, To spread through all the earth abroad, The honors of Thy Name.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His love my heart has captive made, His captive would I be, For He was bound, and scourged and died, To set this sinner free.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord, ‘Tis Thee alone I love I now Thy praises swell. Had I a thousand tongues to sing The half I could not tell.{/lang-eng}
